NO_ADVENTURE: {{emojis.jolyne}} Aun no has empezado tu aventura. ¡Usa `/adventure start` para empezar!
ALREADY_ADVENTURE: {{emojis.jolyne}} Ya has comenzado con tu bizarra aventura.
USER_NO_ADVENTURE: {{emojis.thinking}} **{{user_option.username}}** aún no ha empezado con su aventura.
TRADE: {{emojis.jolyne}} En este momento estás intercambiando. Por favor complete su intercambio primero antes de usar cualquier comando de aventura.
BATTLE: :crossed_swords: En este momento estas en batalla. Por favor termine si batalla primero antes de usar cualquier comando de aventura. ¿No puedes encontrar tu batalla? cliquea aquí: {{link}}
LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE:
:stars: <@{{user.id}}>, You are now level **{{level}}**

:information_source: You gained **4** skill-oints. Use `/skill-points` to use them.
BASE_COOLDOWN: You have to wait **{{timer}}** second(s) before using the `/{{command}}` again.
DEAD: You are dead. Regenerate yourself first.
STAND_DISK_LIMIT: {{npc.jolyne}} Oh oh, you've reached your limit. You can only store **{{limit}}** stand discs. You can increase this limit by becoming a [patron](https://patreon.com/mizuki54).
STAND_DISK_LIMIT_PATREON: {{npc.jolyne}} Oh oh, you've reached your limit. You can only store **{{limit}}** stand discs. You can increase this limit by upgrading your [patreon tier](https://https://patreon.com/mizuki54.com/mizuki54)
